channel.title: CVE Feed for WordPlus -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WordPlus -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-29454|2024-09-16T20:37:34.702Z -- wordplus -- better%20messages%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WordPlus Better Messages plugin <= 1.9.9.148 at WordPress allows attackers to upload files. File attachment to messages must be activated.

item.title: CVE-2022-36389|2024-09-16T16:13:52.351Z -- wordplus -- better%20messages%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WordPlus Better Messages plugin <= 1.9.9.148 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-32802|2024-08-02T02:20:35.514Z -- wordplus -- bp%20better%20messages
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WordPlus BP Better Messages allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects BP Better Messages: from n/a through 2.4.32.

item.title: CVE-2024-32802|2024-06-04T17:51:04.742Z -- wordplus -- bp%20better%20messages
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WordPlus BP Better Messages allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects BP Better Messages: from n/a through 2.4.32.
